evidence.claim: Innvox utilizes AWS services for their cloud infrastructure including Lambda, EC2, and S3.
The platform is designed to be HIPAA-compliant, ensuring the protection of health information.
Innvox supports FHIR standards for health data exchange, facilitating interoperability.
HL7 standards are incorporated for data messaging within the health tech applications.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 or similar healthcare data exchange use cases found.
